name: REDACTED_SENSITIVE_DATA
notes: REDACTED_PASSWORD_PLACEHOLDER uses weak encryption (MD5), it is recommended to change these credentials immediately.

name: vsftpd-config-security
vsftpd-banner-info
description: The FTP server welcome banner may disclose system information. The configuration includes ftpd_banner=Welcome to TP-LINK FTP server, which could assist attackers in identifying the system type.
notes: It is recommended to modify or remove the welcome message to prevent information disclosure.

name: ssh-no-config-found
notes: It is recommended to check other non-standard locations that may contain SSH configurations, such as user home directories or web management interface configuration files.
